MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 area of Falkirk. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far, we have located a fault on our underground cable network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 8AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.09AM on 10th March 2021.
